overview: Phil's nightmare has just begun - En route to his daughter's birthday party, a hapless father annihilates a wiener dog with his car. His descent into darkness accelerates upon arriving to the party- where he discovers two harrowing developments: his ex-wife is remarrying, and the guest of honor at the party is "Noodles" the dachshund, the family's new dog.
title: Noodles Forever
